fixtures.name: default
fixtures.html:
<search>
<form
  class="lbcamden-search  "
  action="/search"
  method="get"
  autocomplete="off">
  <label
    class="govuk-label govuk-label--l govuk-visually-hidden"
    for="lbcamden-search__box">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </label>
  <input
    type="text"
    name="search"
    class="lbcamden-search__input"
    value=""
    id="lbcamden-search__box" 
     />
    
  <button
    type="submit"
    class="lbcamden-search__btn"
    id="lbcamden-search__btn">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </button>
</form>
</search>

fixtures.name: Search input with value
fixtures.html:
<search>
<form
  class="lbcamden-search  "
  action="/search"
  method="get"
  autocomplete="off">
  <label
    class="govuk-label govuk-label--l govuk-visually-hidden"
    for="lbcamden-search__box">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </label>
  <input
    type="text"
    name="search"
    class="lbcamden-search__input"
    value="Housing Repairs"
    id="lbcamden-search__box" 
     />
    
  <button
    type="submit"
    class="lbcamden-search__btn"
    id="lbcamden-search__btn">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </button>
</form>
</search>

fixtures.name: Placeholder text
fixtures.html:
<search>
<form
  class="lbcamden-search  "
  action="/search"
  method="get"
  autocomplete="off">
  <label
    class="govuk-label govuk-label--l govuk-visually-hidden"
    for="lbcamden-search__box">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </label>
  <input
    type="text"
    name="search"
    class="lbcamden-search__input"
    value=""
    id="lbcamden-search__box" placeholder="Customised placeholder"
     />
    
  <button
    type="submit"
    class="lbcamden-search__btn"
    id="lbcamden-search__btn">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </button>
</form>
</search>

fixtures.html:
<search>
<form
  class="lbcamden-search  "
  action="/search"
  method="get"
  autocomplete="off">
  <label
    class="govuk-label govuk-label--l govuk-visually-hidden"
    for="lbcamden-search__box">
      Search Camden.gov.uk

    type="text"
    name="search"
    class="lbcamden-search__input"
    value=""
    id="lbcamden-search__box" 
     />

  <button
    type="submit"
    class="lbcamden-search__btn"
    id="lbcamden-search__btn">
      Search Camden.gov.uk
  </button>
</form>
</search>
